name: Scandic Malmen

reviews.text: The Scandic Malmen is in a residential area of Stockholm and very lively. It is a large hotel but check in was fast and friendly. Hilton Honors guests have access to bottled water and fresh fruit 24/7. The buffet breakfast was fine with the typical meats, cheese, breads, eggs and bacon, yoqurt, cereal and juices. The room was typical small 2 twin beds but ample for 2 people. We were there on the weekend and with the window shut to sleep no noise problem. A/C worked fine also. There is plenty of nightlife across the street in the square a popular trendy club Snaps which was great with outdoor tables and down under a candle lite pub and on the same street as the hotel is Charles Dickens a sports pub, Bullwinkle another club and more all the way down the pedestrian street which will take you to Old Town which has lots of bars and shops. The underground T stop is right outside the hotel entrance and 2 stops to Old Town 3 stops to City Centre. Very easy and cheap to use. For the price we paid about 150 US$ it was a deal! Would definitely stay there again.

reviews.text: It does not deserve an above average rating. I have stayed at many hotels in Stockholm and I was very disappointed with this hotel.

reviews.text: The only good think I can say about it is that it was clean & a great location.
I stayed here for two nights as part as my final holiday in Sweden. Having visited Stockholm many of times my normal hotel was fully booked so I opted for this having wondered about it before.
reviews.title: Good Location Friendly Hotel

reviews.text: The hotel is located almost next to the Medborgarplatsen underground stop on the green line which is just a couple of stops from the central station. The hotel is located in the district of Södermalm which is a lively area of Stockholm knows for it’s nightlife.
reviews.title: Okay hotel, but not more!

reviews.text: I occupied a Cabin Room with a Queen Size Bed; the room was known to have no windows and was located two floors down in the basement. However I found the room to be perfect, having no windows meant I could finally get a good nights sleep after being disturbed in the previous hotels I had stayed in! The room was adequately equipped, good size bed, wardrobe, drawer space, cupboard space, TV, iron and ironing board, desk area and the bathroom was of a good size, spacious with an excellent shower and good supply of towels! There was also two spare pillows and a warmer duvet stored in the wardrobe. The room had air conditioning which was a bonus having no windows, there was no mini bar. Another good bonus is that there is FREE wireless internet in the rooms, you just ask for a log in and password on reception which is valid for 7 days!
reviews.title: Very pleasant hotel with perfect location

reviews.text: The hotel its self is very busy and my only downsize was the waiting time for the three lifts, I was sporting a leg injury so no way fit enough to go up two flights of stairs and I waited for the life for around 10 minutes one morning to get to breakfast, it seemed to completely bypass the basement floors and kept going up and down the other 8 floors!

reviews.text: In a strident effort to be "Green" the Scandic chain has bared amenitites down to a squeeze bottle of handsoap anchored to the wall, and a similar device in the shower. Hardly something you expect to see in a rather expensive suite. No shower cap or lotions were provided. Forget anything as crazy as complimentary water! (You can purchase water at the front desk or if you are a Hilton Gold Card member, you can get a couple of pieces of fruit and a bottle of water for free per day.)

description: Welcome to Scandic Malmen - town life, musical experiences and a feeling of home in the heart of Södermalm.Here you can dine, drink, meet and sleep. And loads of other fun things, such as enjoying free concerts for example. When you stay with us in one of our 332 rooms, you will live in a 50th century building in the middle of the metropolitan pulse. You will also have great access to other parts of the city by metro, train, boat or bus.
